name.am,ar,bg,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_U: HindustanGPT: GPT in Indian Language on Google™
name.de: HindustanGPT - Chatten Sie mit ChatGPT™ auf Google
name.gu: HindustanGPT: Google™ પર ભારતીય ભાષામાં ChatGPT™
name.hi: भारतजीपीटी: गूगल पर भारतीय भाषा में चैटजीपीटी
name.kn: HindustanGPT: Google™ ನಲ್ಲಿ ಭಾರತೀಯ ಭಾಷೆಯಲ್ಲಿ ChatGPT™

short.am,ar,bg,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_U: ChatGPT™ on all Google™ searches in Indian languages.
short.bn: ভারতীয় ভাষায় সমস্ত গুগল অনুসন্ধানে চ্যাটজিপিটি।
short.de: Chatten Sie mit ChatGPT™ bei allen Google-Suchanfragen.
short.es: Chatea con ChatGPT™ en todas las búsquedas de Google.
short.fr: Discutez avec ChatGPT™ sur toutes les recherches Google.
short.gu: ભારતીય ભાષાઓમાં તમામ ગૂગલ સર્ચ પર ચેટજીપીટી.
short.he: צ'אט עם ChatGPT™ בכל חיפושי Google
short.hi: भारतीय भाषाओं में सभी Google™ खोजों पर ChatGPT™।
short.kn,te: భారతీయ భాషలలోని అన్ని Google™ శోధనలలో ChatGPT™.
short.ml: ഇന്ത്യൻ ഭാഷകളിലെ എല്ലാ Google™ തിരയലുകളിലും ChatGPT™.
short.mr: भारतीय भाषांमधील सर्व Google™ शोधांवर ChatGPT™.
short.pt_PT: Bate-papo com ChatGPT™ em todas as pesquisas do Google.
short.ro: Chat cu ChatGPT™ pe toate căutările pe Google.
short.ru: Общайтесь с ChatGPT™ во всех поисковых запросах Google.
short.ta: இந்திய மொழிகளில் அனைத்து Google™ தேடல்களிலும் ChatGPT™.
short.uk: Спілкуйтеся з ChatGPT™ у всіх пошукових запитах Google.
short.zh_CN: 在所有谷歌搜索中与 ChatGPT™ 聊天。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,cs,da,el,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,e:
Generates ChatGPT chat results for the search query you typed on google right from google's page in Indian Languages. 

Languages supported are:
- Bengali
- Gujarati
- Hindi
- Kannada
- Malayalam
- Marathi
- Odia
- Punjabi
- Tamil
- Telugu

It suggests follow-up questions and also allows you to continue the chat with HindGPT without having to leave google's home page. It uses ChatGPT in backend.

Make sure you are logged in at https://chat.openai.com

Unlike few other tools here there is no limit on the number of free queries per day. You have access to unlimited free queries.

For any suggestions check out our website(github). Feel free to create a ticket or send a pull request if you need for any changes at https://github.com/ishandutta2007/chatgpt-on-hindi-google-extension/issues

No ChatGPT Plus plan required.


LEGAL:
Disclaimer: HindGPT is not official ChatGPT™ application. It is an unofficial extension that is developed and maintained independently and has no affiliation to OpenAI .

long.en:
Generates ChatGPT™ chat results for the search query you typed on google right from google's page in Indian Languages. 

Languages supported are:
- Bengali
- Gujarati
- Hindi
- Kannada
- Malayalam
- Marathi
- Odia
- Punjabi
- Tamil
- Telugu

It suggests follow-up questions and also allows you to continue the chat with HindGPT without having to leave google's home page. It uses ChatGPT™ in backend.

Make sure you are logged in at https://chat.openai.com

Unlike few other tools here there is no limit on the number of free queries per day. You have access to unlimited free queries.

For any suggestions check out our website(github). Feel free to create a ticket or send a pull request if you need for any changes at https://github.com/ishandutta2007/chatgpt-on-hindi-google-extension/issues

No ChatGPT™ Plus plan required.


LEGAL:
Disclaimer: HindGPT is not official ChatGPT™ application. It is an unofficial extension that is developed and maintained independently and has no affiliation to OpenAI .
long.ko:
인도어로 된 Google 페이지에서 바로 Google에 입력한 검색어에 대한 ChatGPT 채팅 결과를 생성합니다.

지원되는 언어는 다음과 같습니다:
- 벵골어
- 구자라트어
- 힌디어
- 칸나다어
- 말라얄람어
- 마라티어
- 오디아
- 펀잡어
- 타밀어
- 텔루구어

후속 질문을 제안하고 Google 홈페이지를 떠나지 않고도 HindGPT와 채팅을 계속할 수 있습니다. 백엔드에서 ChatGPT를 사용합니다.

https://chat.openai.com에 로그인되어 있는지 확인하세요.

여기에 있는 다른 도구와 달리 하루 무료 쿼리 수에는 제한이 없습니다. 무제한 무료 쿼리에 액세스할 수 있습니다.

제안 사항이 있으면 당사 웹사이트(github)를 확인하세요. 변경 사항이 필요한 경우 언제든지 https://github.com/ishandutta2007/chatgpt-on-hindi-google-extension/issues에서 티켓을 생성하거나 끌어오기 요청을 보내주세요.
